channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Why more frequent cold blasts could be coming from global warming
item.description: Frigid air that normally stays trapped in the Arctic has escaped, plunging deep into the United States for an extended visit that is expected to provoke teeth-chattering but not be record-shattering.

item.title: The polar vortex brings its bitter cold to the Southern US
Jimmy Carter on his way back to Washington, where he remained an outsider
